summary: THE VEHICLE WAS USING MORE OIL THAN USUAL.   *TT   THE CHANGE ENGINE OIL LIGHT HAD COME ON 300 MILES SHORT OF  THE 3K MILES TO TRAVEL, WHEN THE CONSUMER TESTED THE OIL, IT WAS 1QT LOW.  AT THE END OF THE COMPUTER TEST, THE MILEAGE WAS 14650K MILES.  WHEN THE OIL WAS CHECKED  AT 829 ADDITIONAL MILES FROM THE LAST VISIT, IT WAS 1/4QT LOW.  THE CONSUMER TALKED TO MANY OTHER BUICK OWNERS AND DID NOT FOUND ANOTHER (SAME MAKE/MODEL) WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.   *SCC   *JB
